    Function reference

    All functions

    addClusterLabels()
    Label Clusters in a Network Graph Plot
    addClusterMembership()
    Perform Cluster Analysis on the Nodes of a Network Graph
    addGraphLabels()
    Label Nodes in a Network Graph Plot
    addNodeNetworkStats()
    Compute Node-Level Network Properties
    adjacencyMatAtchleyFromSeqs()
    Network Adjacency Matrix Based on Atchley Factor Representations
    aggregateIdenticalClones()
    Aggregate Counts/Frequencies for Clones With Identical Receptor Sequences
    buildAssociatedClusterNetwork()
    Combine Associated Sequence Neighborhoods and Build Network
    buildPublicClusterNetwork()
    Build Network of Public Clusters
    buildPublicClusterNetworkByRepresentative()
    Build Public Cluster Network By Representative
    buildRepSeqNetwork()
    Immune Repertoire Network By Sequence Similarity
    chooseNodeStats() exclusiveNodeStats()
    Specify Node-level Network Properties to Compute
    clustering_algorithms cluster_edge_betweenness cluster_fast_greedy cluster_fluid_communities cluster_infomap cluster_label_prop cluster_leading_eigen cluster_leiden cluster_louvain cluster_optimal cluster_spinglass cluster_walktrap
    Clustering Algorithms
    loadDataFromFileList() combineSamples()
    Load Multiple Data Files and Combine
    encodeTCRSeqsByAtchleyFactor()
    Numerically Encode TCR Sequences Using Deep Learning
    filterInputData()
    Filter RepSeq Data Rows and/or Subset Columns
    findAssociatedClones()
    Gather Clones in Public Neighborhoods Around Associated Sequences
    findAssociatedSeqs() findAssociatedSeqs2()
    Identify Receptor Sequences Associated With a Binary Variable
    findPublicClusters()
    Find Public Clusters Among RepSeq Samples
    generateNetworkFromAdjacencyMat()
    Generate the Network igraph for an Adjacency Matrix
    generateNetworkGraphPlots()
    Generate Plots of a Network Graph
    generateNetworkObjects()
    Generate Core Objects for a RepSeq Network
    getClusterStats()
    Compute Cluster-Level Network Statistics
    getNeighborhood()
    Compute the Neighborhood Around a Cell/Clone
    hamDistBounded()
    Bounded Computation of Hamming Distance
    installPythonModules()
    Install Python Modules Used by NAIR
    kmeansAtchley()
    Analyze TCR Samples Using Numerical Encoder and K-Means Clustering
    levDistBounded()
    Bounded Computation of Levenshtein Distance
    plotNetworkGraph()
    Plot the Graph of an Immune Repertoire Network
    saveNetwork()
    Save List of Network Objects
    saveNetworkPlots()
    Write Plots to a PDF
    simulateToyData()
    Generate Toy RepSeq Data
    sparseAdjacencyMatFromSeqs()
    Compute Network Adjacency Matrix for Immune Repertoire
